attributes.action: Make Legal Aid available for UK Citizens ONLY
attributes.background: Ban Legal Aid for illegal migrants

rejection.details:
The action in the title and the action in the main text are not the same - action sought is unclear

There are two current petitions on this subject that the petitioner might wish to sign:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/741349

and

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733844
